Text.Page:
Those {@LinkCreature:20#30087000#Relentless Bloodclaw Arachnens} are no end of trouble! Besides trying to cave the walls in, they bite. And their venom is nothing to scoff at.

I want to collect the venom sacs and send them off to the federation scholars. I think that with some examiniation, they'll be able to make up an antidote.

So. Venom sacs. You think you can handle that?

This looks like what I need to get the federation scholars going on what could be an antidote.

Thank you.
If we don't get those sacs to the federation, we won't have any chance to defend against the poison.
